GlowGuide app is an app that helps users to know their skin type, provides advice on suitable and avoidable ingredients in skincare, recommends suitable products and provides an optimal skincare routine based on skin type. So the main features are as follows:

1. Analyze Your Skin
2. Product Recommendation
3. Care Routine

GlowGuide app is an app that helps users to know their skin type, provides advice on suitable and avoidable ingredients in skincare, recommends suitable products and provides an optimal skincare routine based on skin type. GlowGuide provides information on what products are being recommended!

It contains oat, heartleaf, collagen, and real green tea leaves that can clean your face from dirt, dust, air pollution, and makeup residue that is still left on your face after outdoor activities. Even though it can deep cleanse your face, this face wash won\'t give you a tugging effect, instead your face will feel softer and more moisturized! This face wash is also suitable for those with sensitive and acne prone skin types.

After washing your face with a face wash, the next step in your skincare ritual is to use a toner. Yup, using a toner can help your skin absorb the next skincare product better. Well, this toner from Dear Klairs can provide maximum moisture for your skin, balance your skin\'s pH, and most importantly, it can also relieve irritation on your skin.

Looking for a serum that can help your skin look brighter and soothe acne scars? You should put Avoskin Your Skin Bae Serum Alpha Arbutin 3% + Grapeseed on your skincare wish list! This serum combines the active ingredients Alpha Arbutin 3% and extracts from grapeseed. With the combination of the two, you can achieve bright-looking skin. Plus, the antioxidant-rich grapeseed also has a role to keep your skin cells feeling and looking healthier!

Regularly using an exfoliating mask can help to remove dead skin cells, so your skin will feel cleaner. One of the most popular exfoliating masks is the Whitelab Mugwort Pore Clarifying Mask. With tea tree, this mask will control the excess oil present on your face and help to reduce the appearance of acne too, if you use it regularly. Plus, it contains BHA to remove dead skin cells!
To keep your skin healthy, fresh and shiny. You must remember this daily routine!

1. Facial cleanser
2. Toner
3. Serum
4. Moisturizer
5. Sunscreen

1. Double Cleansing
2. Toner
